buildCommand: npm run build && cp dist/css/style.css assets/css/style.min.css && cp dist/js/main.js assets/js/main.min.js && bundle install && echo "url: https://$VERCEL_URL" > _config.vercel.yml && bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml,_config.vercel.yml
installCommand: gem install bundler:2.4.22 && rm -f Gemfile.lock && bundle install && npm install

headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://unpkg.com https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://cdn.tailwindcss.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://unpkg.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'
